input.sentences: went on a bike ride today and it got pretty messy .
this is one of the photos i took from on top of the trail .
that looked like a fun trail to go on but private property .
here was a cool set of stairs i took my bike off of .

output.sentences: My bike ride was pretty messy.
At the top of the trail I took photos.
I followed the trail up to a private property barrier.
I was glad I entered, because the stairs within set a cool atmosphere
The bike ride trail was a day to remember.
